#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int n,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>n;
              if(n==1)
              cout<<"NO\n";
             else if(n==2)
              cout<<"YES\n";
              else if(n%4==1)
              cout<<"YES\n";
              else
              cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return(0);
}
